overview: Anjali leads the client services and analytics team for Bluefin Labs. She comes to Bluefin from Digitas (the top ranked digital agency in the US) where she was a Vice President in the Strategy and Analytics group. With expertise in developing data-driven digital media strategies for Fortune 500 companies, she brings deep measurement and analytics experience to the Bluefin team. Anjali holds an MBA from the MIT Sloan School of Management, and a BA in Economics from Tufts University.
